title: Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies
ingredients: ['150g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '125g butter, softened', '100g demerara sugar', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '170g chocolate chips', '130g chopped dried apricots']
